title: Unzensiert - Bushido's Wahrheit
overview: For two years, the daily life of the Ferchichi family was documented and gives insight into the life of the rapper and his family under police protection. Bushido made the headlines due to his connection to organized crime. In the documentary series Unzensiert - Bushido's Wahrheit (Uncensored - Bushido's truth), Bushido's critics have their say, as well as his wife Anna-Maria and players from the music industry.
